data.eml:eml: First description of the male of the spider Tibellus paraguensis Simon, 1897 (Araneae: Philodromidae), with new distribution records

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Achitte-Schmutzler, Helga C., Rubio, Gonzalo D. (2016): First description of the male of the spider Tibellus paraguensis Simon, 1897 (Araneae: Philodromidae), with new distribution records. Zootaxa 4161 (1): 146-150, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4161.1.12
